Content.Text:
<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I hope I didn't keep you waiting too long,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Come on, I'll take you to the Safari. I can hardly
wait to get there myself!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hope I didn't keep you waiting too long,
<NICKNAME>. Come on, I'll take you to the Safari.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here we are, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Have fun playing with all of the animals. And
when you're ready to go home, just come talk to
me.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here we are, <NICKNAME>.
<PAGE>
Have fun playing with all of the animals. And
when you're ready to go home, just come talk to
me.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Woo-hoo! It's the Safari! Where should we go
first?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, where should we begin?

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay, what should we go look at first?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I am going to search for some exotic animals.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hnn. The trees here look like they need pruning.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think I'll go check out what kinds of flowers are
growing around here.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm going to view the birds first.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, this should be a fantastic place to
find inspiration for another story.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
What do you wanna go look at first?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Spending the time to relax in a wide-open and
peaceful area like this is an excellent way to
reduce stress. Shall we take a walk?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hunh. I should be able to find a lot of interesting
plants here.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yaaay! What should we go look at first?
